name: Flow Convergence
title: Hydro Tulpa: Flow Convergence
desc: "Countless wills dissolved in the water, which, like the universe, was full of souls that wished to be born."
in_play_description: When your Hydro Tulpa, who has this card equipped, is on the field, after you declare the end of your round, if the attached character's HP is not less than 3, they will receive 2 Piercing DMG and summon 1 independent Half-Tulpa.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Hydro Tulpa at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip this to your Hydro Tulpa to attach Elemental Lifeform: Hydro to them. (This character is always affected by Hydro and is immune to Hydro DMG. Duration (Rounds): 2)
When your Hydro Tulpa, who has this card equipped, is on the field, after you declare the end of your round, if the attached character's HP is not less than 3, they will receive 2 Piercing DMG and summon 1 independent Half-Tulpa.
(You must have Hydro Tulpa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
